name: Tavern of Purgatory
description: Not all angels are fit to live in heaven. Some, like Erin, might choose to question the morality of their God, and be exiled accordingly. As they arrive in the mortal plane they find themself in a bar, seated with sinners who they could have never thought on their level. Before they venture out into the world on their own, they must learn what it means to see things from a more human perspective and separate themself from the ideas of divinity.
